title: Setting the scene: virtual spaces (Roger Ford and Owen Paterson)

abstract: Interviews with Roger Ford and Owen Paterson on their process as production designers on creating virtual worlds for film
description: A co-production between AFTRS and ACMI for ACMI's Setting the Scene exhibition. Interviews with two Australian production designers with a focus on creating virtual worlds. Roger Ford talks about the role of a production designer on a production and his experience of creating computer-designed sets from Babe to The Chronicles of Narnia : Prince Caspian. Owen Paterson discusses his work on Speed Racer and the Matrix and creating digital worlds.
